Package model

Class NotesModel

java.lang.Object
model.NotesModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Subject
public class NotesModel extends Object implements Subject
Represents the central data management class in a note-taking application following the MVC pattern. It provides a single point of access for managing notes through a Singleton pattern. Implements the Subject interface to notify observers of state changes.

  • Constructor Details

    • NotesModel

      public NotesModel()
      Private constructor to prevent external instantiation. Initializes the list of notes and observers.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static NotesModel getInstance()
      Provides global access to the singleton instance of the NotesModel. If the instance does not exist, it is created.
      Returns:
      The singleton instance of NotesModel.

    • attach

      public void attach(Observer o)
      Registers an observer to the list of observers. An observer is added only if it is not already registered.
      Specified by:
      attach in interface Subject
      Parameters:
      o - The observer to attach.

    • detach

      public void detach(Observer o)
      Removes an observer from the list of observers.
      Specified by:
      detach in interface Subject
      Parameters:
      o - The observer to detach.

    • notifyObservers

      public void notifyObservers()
      Notifies all registered observers of a change in the model's state.
      Specified by:
      notifyObservers in interface Subject

    • addNote

      public void addNote(String note)
      Adds a new note to the model and notifies observers of the change. A note will only be added if it is not null and not empty after trimming.
      Parameters:
      note - The note to be added.

    • removeNote

      public void removeNote(int index)
      Removes the note at the specified index within the valid range and notifies observers.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the note to be removed.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of range.

    • getNotes

      public List<String> getNotes()
      Returns a new list containing all the notes currently managed by the model. This ensures that the internal notes list cannot be directly modified.
      Returns:
      A list of all notes.

    • clearNotes

      public void clearNotes()
      Clears all notes from the model and notifies observers of the change.
